item.title: Voice Commands Have Been Discovered In Zelda: Majora’s Mask - Time Extension
item.description:
1. Voice Commands Have Been Discovered In Zelda: Majora’s Mask  Time Extension
  2. The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask apparently supports voice commands  Gamereactor UK
  3. N64 mic support discovered in Zelda: Majora's Mask  GoNintendo
